'''Lightning Round''' is the second Act of [[Thunder Sojourn]] [[Event]].

==Event Details==
*During the event, complete the "[[Tracking the Thunder]]" quest to unlock Act II: Lightning Round.
*After starting the challenge, Travelers will need to defeat all opponents within the time limit.
*Complete the challenges to obtain rewards such as [[Thunder Pellet]]s, [[Primogem]]s, and [[Mora]].

===Tutorial===
{| class="tdt1 tdt2" cellspacing="5"
| [[File:Tutorial Lightning Round 1.png|200px]]
| During the Thunder Sojourn event, Travelers can activate mechanisms to enter the Lightning Round challenge. After starting the challenge, Travelers will need to defeat all opponents within the time limit.
|-
| [[File:Tutorial Lightning Round 2.png|200px]]
| During the Lightning Round challenge, you will encounter the special [[Thunder Dwelling]]. Characters in proximity to the Thunder Dwelling who are carrying {{Color|Electrograna}}, are {{Color|affected by Electro}}, or {{Color|use an Electro attack on it}} will charge the dwelling's energy.
|-
| [[File:Tutorial Lightning Round 3.png|200px]]
| Once the Thunder Dwelling is fully charged, it will release a Thunder Shock, dealing Electro DMG to all characters and opponents present on the battlefield. If the Thunder Shock hits an opponent, it will cause them to take more DMG for a period of time. The Thunder Dwelling will be unable to recharge for a brief period after unleashing its Thunder Shock.
|-
| [[File:Tutorial Lightning Round 4.png|200px]]
| An {{Color|Electrogranum}} can absorb the DMG dealt by a Thunder Shock hit.
|}
